Key Match Events: Trey Murphy III scored 22 points in the first three quarters before exiting with an ankle injury.
Dejounte Murray recorded his first triple-double with 14 points, 10 rebounds, and 12 assists.
CJ McCollum continued his strong shooting performance, scoring 25 points and hitting multiple three-pointers.
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans' perimeter marksmanship improved significantly, contributing to their second consecutive victory.
The Pelicans built a double-digit lead in the first half and never faced serious threats from the Wizards after halftime.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trey Murphy III threw down three slams and hit four three-pointers before leaving with an ankle injury.
Yves Missi had 16 points, 7 rebounds, and 3 blocks against the Wizards' No. 2 overall pick, Alex Sarr.
Dejounte Murray assisted CJ McCollum on a play during the game.
Yves Missi blocked Kyle Kuzma's shot during the game.
